So how can you possibly make some serious passive income from eBooks without even writing a word. Well it is possible. With over 2 hours of videos, this course will show you how to:

  • How to find a profitable group to target for your eBook.
  • How to get your eBook written by that same group of people...for free
  • How to market that eBook back to that group!

Split into 3 main steps, the course will also show you:

  • How to get a cover designed for you for $5
  • Get other people to market your eBook for you
  • How to advertise your eBook for free

So if you want to learn some tricks on making money & a passive income from eBook writing, then sign up now.

And the unconditional, Udemy backed, 30 day money-back guarantee is not just any old guarantee, it's my personal promise to you that you will succeed ...
title: eBook Income: Publish an eBook Without Writing a Word
